Package game

Class Mover

java.lang.Object
game.Mover
public class Mover
extends java.lang.Object
Agent to manage the movement of pieces.

    • Mover

      public Mover()
      Constructs a mover.

    • Mover

      public Mover​(boolean isWhiteTurn, King whiteKing, King blackKing)
      Constructs a mover.
      Parameters:
      isWhiteTurn - the current turn
      whiteKing - the white king
      blackKing - the black king

  • Method Details

    • tryMovePiece

      public static boolean tryMovePiece​(Piece piece, int x, int y)
      Moves a piece if the move follows the rules of chess.
      Parameters:
      piece - the piece to attempt to move
      x - the column to attempt to move to
      y - the row to attempt to move to
      Returns:
      true if the piece moves successfully, and false otherwise

    • isValidEnPassant

      private static boolean isValidEnPassant​(Piece piece, int x, int y)
      Checks if a move is valid en passant.
      Parameters:
      piece - the piece to move
      x - the destination column
      y - the destination row
      Returns:
      true if move is valid en passant, and false otherwise

    • tryMoveIsEnPassant

      private static boolean tryMoveIsEnPassant​(Piece piece, int x, int y)
      Assuming that a move is valid, determines if the move is en passant. Should not be called after changing state of board.
      Parameters:
      piece - the piece to move
      x - the destination column
      y - the destination row
      Returns:
      true if move is en passant, and false otherwise

    • isValidMove

      public static boolean isValidMove​(Piece piece, int x, int y, boolean accountForCheck)
      Checks if a move follows the rules of chess. Does not account for player turn.
      Parameters:
      piece - the piece to check a move for
      x - the column to simulate a move to
      y - the row to simulate a move to
      accountForCheck - whether or not the method should ignore check
      Returns:
      true if move follows the rules of chess, and false otherwise

    • isValidCastling

      private static boolean isValidCastling​(Piece piece, int x, int y)
      Checks if a move is valid castling.
      Parameters:
      piece - the piece to move
      x - the destination column
      y - the destination row
      Returns:
      true if move is valid castling, and false otherwise

    • tryMoveIsCastling

      private static boolean tryMoveIsCastling​(Piece piece, int x, int y)
      Assuming that a move is valid, determines if the move is castling. Should not be called after changing state of board.
      Parameters:
      piece - the piece to move
      x - the destination column
      y - the destination row
      Returns:
      true if move is castling, and false otherwise

    • pawnPromotion

      private boolean pawnPromotion​(Pawn pawn, Piece replacement)
      Does pawn promotion on the board, replacing the pawn on the board with what is given in the parameters
      Parameters:
      pawn - is the pawn to be promoted
      replacement - is the type of piece to replace pawn
      Returns:
      true if the promotion is successful, false otherwise (can be used to give the signal to view potentially)

    • trySetHasMoved

      private static boolean trySetHasMoved​(Piece piece)
      Setter for piece's hasMoved field, if it has one.
      Parameters:
      piece - the piece to set hasMoved to true
      Returns:
      true if the piece's hasMoved is set to true

    • isWhiteTurn

      public static boolean isWhiteTurn()
      Checks whose turn it is out of the two colored pieces.
      Returns:
      true if it is White's turn, false if it is Black's turn

    • isInCheckmate

      public static boolean isInCheckmate​(boolean forWhiteking)
      Checks if any of the king is in Check.
      Parameters:
      forWhiteking - represents the color of the piece to be checked
      Returns:
      true if the desired colored piece is in check

    • lastMovePawnPromotion

      public static boolean lastMovePawnPromotion()
      Checks if the last move was pawn promotion.
      Returns:
      true if the move was pawn promotion else false

    • getMoveHistory

      public static MoveHistory getMoveHistory()
      Getter for Move History object created in Mover.
      Returns:
      history the Move history of the particular Mover
